# url

**Instance Property**

The URL of a file on the local file system.

## Declaration

```swift
var url: URL { get }
```

## Getting the file details

- **append**: A Boolean that indicates whether the virtual machine appends data to the file.

items.description: A Boolean that indicates whether the virtual machine appends data to the file.
items.name: append
